info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 4:13PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Otero County through 500 PM MDT... At 412 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles east of Orogrande, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... The Otero Mesa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
